title: Every Lipstick Worn at the Grammys 2017

organizations.name: marc jacobs beauty le marc liquid lip
marc jacobs beauty le marc lip crème lipstick
giorgio armani smooth silk lip pencil

text: Celebrity Red-Carpet Beauty Every Lipstick Worn at the Grammys 2017 The exact shades behind the prettiest custom nudes, peaches, and pinks of the night—straight from the makeup artist who created them. February 12, 2017 Beyoncé Beyoncé's goddess-like look wouldn't have been complete with a flawless minimalist lip. To create this warm neutral hue, makeup artist Sir John, first used Dose of Colors Matte Liquid Lipstick in Chocolate Wasted to contour the shape of her lip , and then filled lips in with Cork. Camila Cabello Makeup artist, Allan Avendaño topped Camila Cabello's lips with Burt’s Bees Tinted Lip Oil in Whispering Orchid for a settle hint of pink, completing her fresh-faced look. Lady Gaga For Lady Gaga's eye-catching fuchsia lip, makeup artist Sarah Tanno, swiped on Marc Jacobs Beauty Le Marc Lip Crème Lipstick in Boy Gorgeous 222 . Chrissy Teigen For Chrissy Teigen's custom-nude lip, makeup artist Patrick Ta, mixed Sephora Collection Cream Lip Stain in 22 Pink Late and 23 Copper Blush , and then added Sephora Collection Colorful Gloss Balm in Balm for a dewy finish. Adele Adele's pretty peachy hue was the perfect complement to her emerald green ensemble. To get this shade makeup artist Michael Ashton, filled her lips with Marc Jacobs Beauty Le Marc Liquid Lip Crème in Slow Burn 458, and Fawn Over Me 452 , and then tidied up the edges with a lip liner. Charli XCX Charli XCX served '90s supermodel glam from head to toe. To create this nude lip makeup artist Colby Smith, first applied Make Up For Ever Aqua Lip Pencil in 4C all over the lips to create a base, and then added Make Up For Ever Artist Rouge Creme in C105 . Instead of using a gloss Smith topped her lip with Kiehl's Lip Balm #1 to add a bit of shine that isn't sticky. Demi Lovato For Demi Lovato's shiny nude lip, makeup artist Jill Powell first lined lips with Giorgio Armani Smooth Silk Lip Pencil in #2 , and then applied Giorgio Armani Rouge d’Armani lipstick in #102 . To add a bit os sheen to her lips she swiped on Giorgio Armani Ecstasy Lacquer in #202 . Fashion From Jennifer Lopez to Nicki Minaj, take a look back at the most shocking Grammys red carpets looks. #
